publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7948 Tom McCabe: Chinese Consul General—That the Parliament congratulates Madame Tan Xiutian on what it considers to be her successful posting as the Chinese Consul General in Edinburgh; further considers that the work of the Consul General and her team has significantly contributed to strengthening positive relations between Scotland and China; recognises the support that she has given to many organisations throughout Scotland, and wishes Madame Tan Xiutian every success in the future. Supported by: Gil Paterson*, Stewart Stevenson*, Bill Kidd*, Trish Godman*, David McLetchie*, Jamie McGrigor*, Ted Brocklebank*, Jackie Baillie*, Patricia Ferguson*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Ken Macintosh*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Rob Gibson*, Helen Eadie*, Pauline McNeill*, Liam McArthur*, Rhona Brankin*, Maureen Watt*, Mary Mulligan*, Hugh Henry*, Sandra White*, David Whitton*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-7948 Chinese Consul General (lodged on 15 February 2011) Robin Harper*, Jack McConnell*
S3M-7948 Chinese Consul General (lodged on 15 February 2011) Elaine Murray*
